title: Fixing This TERRIBLE Amazon "Gaming PC" Went...Well
description: *Video Sponsor: Go learn some exciting stuff using Brilliant.org. The first 200 of to sign up with (link) will get 20% off Brilliant's annual premium subscription   Amazon aff. Link to the Timmy Bater 9000:   I try and fix up a stupid gaming PC I bought from amazon with an RTX 4070 in it for some reason.  Get some AWESOME Dawid T-shirts, Mouse pads and more here:   Play some Minecraft on the Dawid Does Minecraft server courtesy of our friends at Linode! Dawid Does Minecraft Name: Mctenthiddy, server IP: mc.tenthiddy.com It works on Java version 1.19.3  Support the channel on Patreon:    *Follow me on whichever Social media you don't hate* Discord:  Twitch:  Twitch bits on YouTube:
